languages.text: {n}Маршал Грегорас Стракс делает выверенный шаг вперед, лязгая доспехом.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, судите меня. Я посрамил имя Адептус Арбитес, поддавшись на манипуляции префекта Вультур. Я предал Лекс Империалис, который должен был блюсти. Я виновен. Исполните приговор".

{n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал Грегорас Стракс делает выверенный шаг вперед, лязгая доспехом.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, судите меня. Я посрамил имя Адептус Арбитес, поддавшись на манипуляции префекта Вультур. Я предал Лекс Империалис, который должен был блюсти. Я виновен. Исполните приговор".

I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

languages.text: {n}Marschall Gregoras Strachs tritt mit klirrendet Rüstung vor.{/n} "Ihr müsst auch über mich richten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe das Adeptus Arbites beschämt, indem ich Präfektin Vulturs Manipulationen erlag und das Lex Imperia verriet, ausgerechnet das Gesetz, das zu wahren ich geschworen habe. Ich bin schuldig. Ich bestehe darauf, dass Ihr das Urteil verkündet und umgehend vollstreckt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marschall Gregoras Strachs tritt mit klirrendet Rüstung vor.{/n} "Ihr müsst auch über mich richten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe das Adeptus Arbites beschämt, indem ich Präfektin Vulturs Manipulationen erlag und das Lex Imperia verriet, ausgerechnet das Gesetz, das zu wahren ich geschworen habe. Ich bin schuldig. Ich bestehe darauf, dass Ihr das Urteil verkündet und umgehend vollstreckt."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal Gregoras Strachs fait un pas mesuré en avant dans le bruit métallique de son armure.{/n} « Vous devez me juger également, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'ai déshonoré l'Adeptus Arbites en succombant aux manipulations de la préfète Vultur et trahi la Lex Imperialis, la loi même que j'avais juré de faire respecter. Je suis coupable. J'insiste pour que vous prononciez ma sentence et l'exécutiez immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal Gregoras Strachs fait un pas mesuré en avant dans le bruit métallique de son armure.{/n} « Vous devez me juger également, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'ai déshonoré l'Adeptus Arbites en succombant aux manipulations de la préfète Vultur et trahi la Lex Imperialis, la loi même que j'avais juré de faire respecter. Je suis coupable. J'insiste pour que vous prononciez ma sentence et l'exécutiez immédiatement. »

languages.text: {n}格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯慎重地向前迈了一步，身上的盔甲铿锵作响。{/n}“我也需要接受审判，行商浪人。我听从沃尔图尔行政官的操纵，令法务部蒙辱，背叛了我本该维护的帝国法典。我犯下了罪行，我坚决要求你即刻传达判决，立刻执行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯慎重地向前迈了一步，身上的盔甲铿锵作响。{/n}“我也需要接受审判，行商浪人。我听从沃尔图尔行政官的操纵，令法务部蒙辱，背叛了我本该维护的帝国法典。我犯下了罪行，我坚决要求你即刻传达判决，立刻执行。”

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal Gregoras Strachs da un paso al frente, haciendo que su armadura retumbe.{/n} «También debe juzgarme a mí, Comerciante Independiente. He avergonzado al Adeptus Arbites al sucumbir a las manipulaciones de la Prefecta Vultur y traicionado la Lex Imperialis, la misma ley que debía defender. Soy culpable. Insisto en que dicte sentencia y la ejecute de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal Gregoras Strachs da un paso al frente, haciendo que su armadura retumbe.{/n} «También debe juzgarme a mí, Comerciante Independiente. He avergonzado al Adeptus Arbites al sucumbir a las manipulaciones de la Prefecta Vultur y traicionado la Lex Imperialis, la misma ley que debía defender. Soy culpable. Insisto en que dicte sentencia y la ejecute de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥は、鎧を鳴らしながら慎重に一歩を踏み出す。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、私も裁いてください。私は、ヴァルター総監の策略に屈し、高等裁定局に泥を塗り、守ろうとしていた法であるレックス・インペリアを裏切りました。私は有罪です。直ちに判決を下し、執行することを求めます」
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥は、鎧を鳴らしながら慎重に一歩を踏み出す。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、私も裁いてください。私は、ヴァルター総監の策略に屈し、高等裁定局に泥を塗り、守ろうとしていた法であるレックス・インペリアを裏切りました。私は有罪です。直ちに判決を下し、執行することを求めます」

languages.text: {n}Miralay Gregoras Strachs, zırhının şangırtıları eşliğinde ölçülü bir adım atıyor.{/n} "Beni de yargılamalısınız Hür Tacir. Prefekt Vultur'un manipülasyonlarına kanarak Adeptus Arbites'in yüzünü kara çıkardım ve korumakla mükellef olduğum Lex İmperialis'e, bizzat kanuna ihanet ettim. Suçluyum. Beni derhâl infaz ederek cezalandırmanızı talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Gregoras Strachs takes a measured step forward, his armour clanging.{/n} "You must judge me also, Rogue Trader. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by succumbing to Prefect Vultur's manipulations, and betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was meant to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

Prefekt Vultur'un manipülasyonlarına kanarak Adeptus Arbites'in yüzünü kara çıkardım ve korumakla mükellef olduğum Lex Imperialis'e, bizzat kanuna ihanet ettim. Suçluyum. Beni derhâl infaz ederek cezalandırmanızı talep ediyorum."
